trans-unit.source: Represents a collection container that enables a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> class represents a collection container that enables a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls as child controls.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the end of an ordinal index array.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a new control at a specific index location.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at a specified index, using simple array notation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control that owns this collection of child controls.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method adds the new control to the end of an ordinal index array.
The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
To add a control to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to add to the collection.
The v parameter does not specify a control.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to the collection at the specified index location.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method adds the new control to the collection at the specified index location.
The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
To add a control at the end of an ordinal index array, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method.
The array index at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to add to the collection.
The v parameter does not specify a control.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control at the specified index location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the specified index, using simple array notation.
The ordinal index value that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref>.
A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref>.
